summary:
I used to be release ThunderBirdArmor in the Oblivion
This mod add ThunderBirdArmor.This is all new ThunderBirdArmor.
descriptionHtml:
V1.0

I fix everything
Now ThunderBirdArmor\'s Values similar to EbonyArmor
add armor craftable and upgradable with ebony perk
also add the weight sliders with CBBE and UNP
I think now ThunderBirdArmor is Perfect

if you find any bug or got any now suggestion,just call me


===Description===
I am not good at English

This is my first time to upload Skyrim mod

I used to be release ThunderBirdArmor in the Oblivion

This mod add ThunderBirdArmor.This is all new ThunderBirdArmor.
this armor use CBBE body and a little change

by the way,the world model has a little problem
so do not put armor on the ground

===Location===
A chest in the Whiterun. Near the jorrvaskr
Precise location in the picture
Open the box, and take it.

just like old time~~~

===Licensing===
If anyone want change my mod to release
Must go through my consent
Someone make me do is

special Thanks 
==================
  yota71 (I am glad he let me do is mod)
author: ken1945
